scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run copy-builds
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: echo 'Building admin...' && cd admin && npm run build
scripts.copy-builds: echo 'Copying builds...' && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist backend/public/frontend && cp -r admin/dist backend/public/admin && echo 'Copy completed'
